message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $10000 to you. Considering its value and exclusivity, I would like to propose a price of $8500 for it. I believe this offer provides a great opportunity for both of us.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market demand.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and I understand your perspective. I am willing to consider your offer. However, I would need to adjust the price slightly to $7500 for this transaction. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the purchase.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $7000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $7250. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. I'm glad we're getting closer. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I'm prepared to accept a price of $7375. I believe this offers a fair solution for both parties involved.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I propose a price of $7200. I believe this is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product, considering its value and our previous discussions.

I understand your position, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my initial offer and your last proposal. Therefore, I propose a price of $7150 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise considering the value of the product and our negotiations so far.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I propose a price of $7100. I believe this is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product, considering its value and our previous discussions.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm glad we're making progress. Considering our negotiations, I'm willing to accept a price of $7075 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I propose a price of $7050. I believe this is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product, considering its value and our previous discussions.
